description:
## 2024-07-22 `1.38.0`

#### ğŸ‰ New features

- Added the option `info` to `appearance` property on `Status` component. ([#81](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/81) by [@jefferson.lima](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/jefferson.lima))

## 2024-07-22 `1.37.1`

#### ğŸ› Bug fixes

- Removed `placement` property of the `Toast` component. ([#79](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))

#### ğŸ‰ New features

- Added the property `onClose` to `Toast` component. ([#79](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))

## 2024-07-19 `1.3.0`

#### ğŸ‰ New features

- Added appearance `info` option to the component. ([#81](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/81) by [@jefferson.lima](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/jefferson.lima))

## 2024-07-04 `2.1.0`

#### ğŸ‰ New features

- Added new `info` appearance variant to `Status` component. ([#81](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/81) by [@jefferson.lima](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/jefferson.lima))
